entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:24 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
